objectives.title: Improve knowledge relevant to team delivery
objectives.description: Examples of knowledge gaps identified, and actively mitigated with self-learning / KT from other team members

objectives.title: Deliver stories and features in line with business priorities
objectives.description: How many stories have you delivered independently

objectives.title: Understand Engagement Team structure and responsibilities
objectives.description: Learn and then Present information on engagement Domain

objectives.title: Understand Team Agile Process
objectives.description: Learn and then Present information on team's Agile Process, with pros/cons and suggestions for improvement

objectives.title: Understand Trips
objectives.description: Learn and then present on TRIPS and the benefits/issues surrounding it

objectives.title: Identify Team Improvements
objectives.description: Example of identifying a technical or process improvement that can be made, taking ownership of how this might be executed with help from the rest of the team
